basics.label: Inventory Analyst/Materials Planner
basics.summary: Industrial Engineer with wide experience in manufacturing, quality, material planning and inventory control. Reach revenue goals through hard work and process improvement. Expert in MRP II, proficient in MS office and Exact Macola. Bilingual English/Spanish.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Analyzed MRP output and exceptions. Worked with Procurement to expedite and prevent shortages, revised and corrected safety stock levels, audited inventory transactions and posted corrections.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Scheduled Job installation, placed and kept track of purchase orders and productions orders. Kept track of budget vs expenses. Prepared executive reports.
highlights: Improved cost control and project management

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Successfully managed numerous software implementations of Exact Macola (ERP), MP2 (maintenance), Goldmine (CRM). As senior consultant trained customers and automatized operations for medium and large companies.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed logistics and operations in the Distribution Center. Setup and launched production lines until fully operative.
highlights: Reached desired efficiency in short time

education.institution: Pontificia Universidad Catolica Madre y Maestra
